original: Ekstrand, Alvar Vilhelm Wremp, landsfogde, Jönköping, f. 3/11/02 i Käl-’leryd, Jönköp. 1., av stat:insp. Peter Wilhelm W.-E. o. Betty Constance Haglund. G. 39 m. Maud Örtenblad. — Stud:ex. i Lund 21, jur. kand. 28. Tingstjg. i Oxie o. Skytts doms. 28-29, i Fryksdals 29-31, e. o. not. i Svea hovr. 31-32, tjg. v. krim:pol. i Malmö o. Sthlm 32, e. länsnot. i Malmöh. 1. 33, tf. landsfogde i Värml. 1 32, östergötl. 1. 33, Vä&terb. 1. 33-36, Jönköp. 1. 36, ord. landsfogde där fr. 37. Led. av förläggn :komm. in. soc :dep. 42. RNO, NFrK, DFrM, PoliFK i guHd 47.
translated: Ekstrand, Alvar Vilhelm Wremp, district governor, Jönköping, born on November 3, 1902 in Käl-’leryd, Jönköping county, son of state inspector Peter Wilhelm W.-E. and Betty Constance Haglund. Married in 1939 to Maud Örtenblad. He passed his exam from Lund in 1921, became a law graduate in 1928. He served as a judicial clerk in Oxie and Skytts district court in 1928-1929, in Fryksdals district court in 1929-1931, as temporary notary in the Svea Court of Appeal in 1931-1932, served in criminal police in Malmö and Stockholm in 1932, appointed as county notary in Malmö in 1933, temporary district governor in Värmland from 1932, Östergötland from 1933, Västernorrland from 1933-1936, Jönköping from 1936, and appointed as regular district governor there from 1937. He was a member of the relocation committee in the social department in 1942, and recipient of the RNO, NFrK, DFrM, and PoliFK in guHd 47.

structured.name: Alvar Vilhelm Wremp Ekstrand
structured.description: Alvar Vilhelm Wremp Ekstrand was a district governor in Jönköping.
